nodes.text: The Hidden Cave was located in Mother Nightsister fortress and was the home of Old Daka when she summoned the Army of the Dead to destroy the Separatist Droid Army. Normally accessible only by magic, the cave was breached during the battle when a commando droid blasted it open with a rocket launcher, allowing General Grievous to murder Old Daka and disrupt Talzin's torture of Count Dooku.
